title: Jummah Prayer Time
content: Jummah prayer is held every Friday at 1:00 PM. Please arrive early for the khutbah.

title: Sunday School Registration Open
content: Registration for the 2026 Sunday School session is now open. Classes available for ages 5-15.

title: Community Iftar
content: Join us for community iftar during Ramadan. Volunteers needed for food preparation and serving.
